headline: 3 of Wall Street’s Favorite Stocks We Find Risky
summary: Wall Street has set ambitious price targets for the stocks in this article. While this suggests attractive upside potential, it’s important to remain skeptical because analysts face institutional pressures that can sometimes lead to overly optimistic forecasts.

headline: What to Expect From Charter Communications' Q3 2025 Earnings Report
summary: Charter Communications will release its third-quarter earnings later this month, and analysts anticipate a high single-digit bottom-line growth.
